title: Tutorial: Filling the Union Dues Form Correctly
author: Mondli Sibanda

blocks.text: Follow these steps to fill out your dues form accurately and avoid costly mistakes.
Visit the union portal and download the latest version of the dues form.

items: Ensure your full legal name matches your ID.
Provide a valid employee or membership number.

blocks.text: Refer to your pay slip for the correct monthly deduction. Enter it clearly.
Step 4: Submit and Keep a Copy

items: Submit the form to your HR office or union rep.
Retain a stamped copy for your records.

blocks.text: A careful form today prevents delays tomorrow.
